DOC.brief_summary: to assess the efficacy of inhaled furosemide in mustard gas exposed patients with acute respiratory failure
DOC.brief_title: Furosemide Inhalation in Dyspnea of Mustard Gas Exposed Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients with a history of exposure to sulfur mustard with a complaint of dyspnea A contraindication for furosemide use; An accompanying disease in which other drugs effective for dyspnea were used
